item.Assault Vest: Holder's Sp. Def is 1.5x, but it can only select damaging moves.
item.Choice Band: Holder's Attack is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
item.Choice Scarf: Holder's Speed is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
item.Choice Specs: Holder's Sp. Atk is 1.5x, but it can only select the first move it executes.
item.Eviolite: If holder's species can evolve, its Defense and Sp. Def are 1.5x.
item.Focus Sash: If holder's HP is full, will survive an attack that would KO it with 1 HP. Single use.
item.Leftovers: At the end of every turn, holder restores 1/16 of its max HP.
item.Life Orb: Holder's attacks do 1.3x damage, and it loses 1/10 its max HP after the attack.
item.Lum Berry: Holder cures itself if it is confused or has a major status condition. Single use.
item.Mental Herb: Cures holder of Attract, Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, Torment. Single use.
item.Power Herb: Holder's two-turn moves complete in one turn (except Sky Drop). Single use.
item.Rocky Helmet: If holder is hit by a contact move, the attacker loses 1/6 of its max HP.
item.Sitrus Berry: Restores 1/4 max HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.
item.Absorb Bulb: Raises holder's Sp. Atk by 1 stage if hit by a Water-type attack. Single use.
item.Adrenaline Orb: Raises holder's Speed by 1 stage if it gets affected by Intimidate. Single use.
item.Air Balloon: Holder is immune to Ground-type attacks. Pops when holder is hit.
item.Aloraichium Z: If held by an Alolan Raichu with Thunderbolt, it can use Stoked Sparksurfer.
item.Apicot Berry: Raises holder's Sp. Def by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.
item.Babiri Berry: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Steel-type attack. Single use.
item.Berry Juice: Restores 20 HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Single use.
item.Big Root: Holder gains 1.3x HP from draining/Aqua Ring/Ingrain/Leech Seed/Strength Sap.
item.Black Sludge: Each turn, if holder is a Poison type, restores 1/16 max HP; loses 1/8 if not.
item.BrightPowder: The accuracy of attacks against the holder is 0.9x.
item.Buginium Z: If holder has a Bug move, this item allows it to use a Bug Z-Move.
item.Cell Battery: Raises holder's Attack by 1 if hit by an Electric-type attack. Single use.
item.Charti Berry: Halves damage taken from a supereffective Rock-type attack. Single use.
item.Chesto Berry: Holder wakes up if it is asleep. Single use.

item.Custap Berry: Holder moves first in its priority bracket when at 1/4 max HP or less. Single use.
